Tenta Brella is a less reactive weapon of the Brella class with high damage and range.

- Combining this weapon with a quick, stealthy weapon, such as Carbon Roller allows the to distract, meanwhile, the slayer can shark an opponent. Additionally, the teammate can hide beneath the brella's coverage when released to further the attack.

- The user can ignite the Ink Vac special to counter attackers.
